periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 81, with temperatures falling to around 79 in the afternoon. South wind 15 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 9pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 9pm and 3am. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 61. South wind 18 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 46 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 10am and 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 39. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.
